channel.title: Server online?
channel.description: I think my server is correctly portforwarded with utorrent and i have my no-ip in my client.java, however i cannot connect to the client myself. Is there anything special i need to do? I have everything ready for public use except this, could someone please help me or teamviewer me!!!! I would be extremely grateful!

item.title: Server online?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You personally need to connect through your own client through localhost (127.0.0.1). When you distribute the client, be sure to use whatever IP you used to portfoward.

Read full topic

item.title: Server online?
item.dc:creator: @pabb pabb
item.description:
@pabb wrote:

I think my server is correctly portforwarded with utorrent and i have my no-ip in my client.java, however i cannot connect to the client myself. Is there anything special i need to do?
